item.description:
Hi all-

I am going to be hosting a second Pug Meetup each month to cut down on the cramped quarters in the room with so many attendees, as well as offer a later playtime for those who cannot make it so early. Please only sign up for one meetup each month to allow playtime for our members. This meetup will be the third Saturday each month from 1p-3p. Let's see how this works out and it may be permanent. if you have any feedback, please let me know your thoughts.

Also, If you decide to attend this meet instead of the one this Sat, May 3rd, please RSVP 'no' on this Sat to open that to another playmate.

Thanks and see you at meetup!
item.name: 2nd Pug Monthly Meet
